title: Fix permission denial state being overwritten
description:
Critical: When runtime permissions are denied with 'Don't ask again', the PERMANENTLY_DENIED status is immediately overwritten back to NOT_REQUESTED by permissionManager.refreshPermissionState().

Root cause: PermissionExtensions.kt defaults non-granted permissions to NOT_REQUESTED during refresh.

Fix: Remove refreshPermissionState() call from runtime permission callbacks - PermissionLauncherManager already updates state correctly via updatePermissionState().

Files: FeatureGroupDetailPresenter.kt, PermissionExtensions.kt

title: Add PERMANENTLY_DENIED permission handling in UI
description:
Critical: When a dangerous permission reaches PERMANENTLY_DENIED state (user selected 'Don't ask again'), the UI still shows 'Grant Permission' button which fails silently.

Fix: Add conditional rendering in FeatureGroupDetailUi.kt to show 'Open App Settings' button when status is PERMANENTLY_DENIED.

title: Show permission rationale on denial
description:

Fix: Show rationale in denial message to explain why permission is needed.

title: Fix special permission state refresh timing
description:
Critical: When users return from system settings after granting a special permission, the UI often shows stale 'denied' state because refreshPermissionState() is called immediately after startActivity().

Fix: Use onResume lifecycle hook to refresh permission state when returning from settings. Consider DisposableEffect with Lifecycle.Event.ON_RESUME.
